SEARCH
Package basepack

Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
basepack.Hotel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Hotel extends Object implements Serializable
The Hotel class represents a hotel with a name, a room count, and a list of rooms.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructs a Hotel instance with the specified hotel name.

    • Hotel

      public Hotel(String hotelName)
      Constructs a Hotel instance with the specified hotel name. Initializes the room count to 0 and adds an initial room to the room list.
      Parameters:
      hotelName - The name of the hotel.

      public String removeRoom(int index)
      The removeRoom() method removes a room from a list if it exists has no reservations, and the room count is greater than 1.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      string result of the removal

    • updatePrice

      public String updatePrice(double price)
      The updatePrice() method sets the base price for all rooms in a list to a specified value and prints a confirmation message.
      Parameters:
      price - The price represents the new base price that will be set for all rooms in the roomList.
      Returns:
      String feedback message.

    • updateDatePrice

      public void updateDatePrice(int date, double percent)
      The updateDatePrice() method sets the date price modifier for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - is the date the price would be set.
      percent - is the percent modifier that will be set.

    • addHotelReservation

      public String addHotelReservation(String name, int checkIn, int checkOut, int roomIndex, String[] breakdown)
      The addHotelReservation() method adds a reservation for a guest with specified check-in and check-out dates to an available room in a hotel.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the person making the hotel reservation.
      checkIn - The checkIn parameter represents the check-in date for the hotel reservation.
      checkOut - The checkOut parameter represents the check-out date for a hotel reservation.
      roomIndex - The roomIndex parameter represents the index of the room in the roomList.
      breakdown - The breakdown parameter represents the list of items that the guest will be charged for.
      Returns:
      String display feedback message.

    • removeHotelReservation

      public String removeHotelReservation(int roomIndex, int resIndex)
      The removeHotelReservation() method removes a reservation from a specific room in a hotel.
      Parameters:
      roomIndex - The roomIndex parameter represents the index of the room in the roomList.
      resIndex - The resIndex parameter represents the index of the reservation to be removed.
      Returns:
      String message if successful or not.

    • getHotelIncome

      public double getHotelIncome()
      The getHotelIncome() method calculates the total income generated from all room reservations in a hotel.
      Returns:
      String display feedback message.

    • getHotelDetails

      public String[] getHotelDetails()
      Retrieves the details of the hotel, including the hotel name, room count, and reservation count.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the hotel details: details[0] - Hotel name details[1] - Room count details[2] - Reservation count

    • getBasePrice

      public double getBasePrice()
      The method getBasePrice() gets the base price of the hotel.
      Returns:
      The base price of the hotel.

    • getPricePerType

      public double getPricePerType(int index)
      Retrieves the price per type of a room based on its index in the roomList.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the room in the roomList
      Returns:
      the price per type of the room, or the base price of the first room if the index is out of bounds or the room is of an unknown type

      public int checkNumAvailableRooms(int date)
      The method checkNumAvailableRooms() iterates through a list of rooms and counts the number of rooms available for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which one wants to check the availability of rooms.
      Returns:
      The number of available rooms for a given date.

    • checkNumBookedRooms

      public int checkNumBookedRooms(int date)
      The method checkNumBookedRooms() counts the number of rooms that are not available for booking on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date for which you want to check the availability of rooms.
      Returns:
      The method is returning the number of booked rooms for a specific date.

    • printReservation

      public String[] printReservation(int roomIndex, int resIndex)
      The method printReservation() prints the room name, price per night, and available check-in dates for a room.
      Parameters:
      roomIndex - The index of the room.
      resIndex - The index of the reservation.
      Returns:
      The method is returning the room name, price per night, and available check-in dates.
